revised_title: A New Auxiliary Equation for Quintic Equations: Simplifying the Solution
tldr: The author, Arthur Cayley, introduces a new auxiliary equation for solving quintic equations, which simplifies the process of finding the roots. This new equation is closely connected to the resolvent-product equation and is derived using symmetric functions. The solution of a quintic equation can now be determined using a single equation of the sixth order, making it more efficient than previous methods.
